analysis.title: TARGET ANALYSIS
analysis.objective_skills:
Skills Report:
Our data seems to indicate that he is an excellent programmer, very creative as well. If I were a company, I would be delighted to hire him.
Our spies report that he mainly uses Java but is also very proficient with Python and JavaScript and is no stranger to C++.
On the next page, his skills are explored in more detail.

skills.title: SKILLS
skills.1: The target has extensive knowledge of Java, the language he feels most comfortable with.
skills.2: The target has experience with Godot, Phaser (on which this game is made), Pygame, and GameMaker.
skills.3: The target uses both React and Vanilla JS for Frontend.
skills.4: The target uses Node + Express for Backend.
skills.5: The target is not unfamiliar with graphic design; if required, he is capable of using Figma and Aseprite.
skills.6: The target has general knowledge of C++ and is seeking to deepen it. He has mainly experimented with small games.

page1.1: Electronic Voting Website for Premios Lola 2024 (Argentina, Buenos Aires, Junín). Fullstack, technologies used: React, Express, NodeJS, MySQL, Firebase.
page1.2: Automatic menus library for Java terminal applications.
page1.4: 4 months as Volunteer Technical Support at QloxHost (a free VPS hosting service that closed) in 2022.
page1.5: Development of a static institutional website proposal for the Technical Highschool 'Escuela Técnica 2' (Argentina, Buenos Aires, Junín).
page1.6: Development of Scripts for Minecraft servers.
page1.7: Unpublished videogames made in Godot 4 and Pygame.

page2.1: Streamer and YouTuber in the past, where he developed good communication skills.
page2.2: Creation of a mini retro videogame console in Arduino.

final.text:
This is all the information collected by the computer.
